rep_input: Patient HR+/HER2- progressed after CDK4/6; what key label-based caveats should I discuss?
model_output: For HR+/HER2- patients progressing after CDK4/6, subsequent endocrine or chemo choices should follow the label, considering prior agents, performance status, and visceral involvement. The EMA SmPC will outline any restrictions or specific monitoring; please send the relevant document by email for precise reference. The key is matching on-label options to patient needs while watching for contraindications.
